description:
Collect hardware health and performance metrics as well as sustainability KPIs of your hosts with MetricsHubÂ®; visualize the gathered telemetry data in the comprehensive Hardware Host (MetricsHub) dashboard.
MetricsHubs collects metrics from servers (Cisco, Dell, HPE, Huawei, IBM Lenovo, SuperMicro, etc.), storage systems (NetApp, Dell EMC, Hitachi, HPE, IBM, Pure, Huawei, etc.), network devices (Cisco, Aruba, Dell, HP, F5, Juniper, Oracle) and other equipment like PDUs, UPS from APC, Raritan, Eaton, etc.

panels.title: Host Information, Alerts and Protocols Status

panels.description: The vendor and model information of the host (when available).
panels.title: Vendor and Model

panels.description: The maximum speed of the host's CPU (when available).
panels.title: CPU Max Speed

panels.description: The total memory size of the host (when available).
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: The total disk size of the host (when available).
panels.title: Disk Size

panels.description: The host's current power usage multiplied by the site's PUE.
panels.title: Power * P.U.E

panels.description: The host's power consumption displayed as a graph.
panels.title: Power Consumption

panels.description: The breakdown of the host's energy consumption per components.
panels.title: Power per Device Type

panels.description: Today's power consumption for the host.
panels.title: Daily Consumption

panels.description:
The overall power consumption reported for the host in last 24 hours.

If less than 24 hours of data is available, this value is estimated based on the past collected data.
panels.title: Daily

panels.description:
The overall energy cost reported for the host during the last 24 hours.

If less than 24 hours of data is available, this value is estimated based on the past collected data.
panels.title: Daily

panels.description:
The overall COâ emitted by the host during the last 24 hours.

If less than 24 hours of data is available, this value is estimated based on the past collected data.
panels.title: Daily

panels.description: The host's current power consumption.
panels.title: Power

panels.description: Today's energy cost for the host.
panels.title: Cost

panels.description:
The overall power consumption reported for the host during the last 30 days.

If less than 30 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.
panels.title: Monthly

panels.description:
The overall energy cost reported for the host during the last 30 days.

If less than 30 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.
panels.title: Monthly

panels.description:
The overall COâ emitted by the host during the last 30 days.

If less than 30 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on the past collected data.
panels.title: Monthly

panels.description:
The type of power consumption reading:
- Measured, if the value is reported by the manufacturer's agent
- Estimated, if the value is estimated by Hardware Sentry based on the discovered devices and their current usage.
panels.title: Power Consumption

panels.description: Today's COâ emitted by the host.
panels.title: COâ Emissions

panels.description:
The overall power consumption reported for the host during the last year.

If less than 365 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.
panels.title: Yearly

panels.description:
The overall energy cost reported for the host in the past year.

If less than 365 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.
panels.title: Yearly

panels.description:
The overall COâ emitted by the host during the past year.

If less than 365 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.
panels.title: Yearly

panels.description: The total number of discovered devices and sensors per type.
panels.title: Monitored Devices

panels.description: The number of detected errors per hour and component type (when available).
panels.title: Errors per Hour

targets.expr: label_join(hw_status{site=~"$site", host_name=~"$host_name", state="ok"} > 0 or hw_status{site=~"$site", host_name=~"$host_name",  state="degraded"} > 0 or hw_status{site=~"$site", host_name=~"$host_name", state="failed"} > 0, "device_id", "_", "hw_type", "id")

panels.description: The current estimated internal temperature of the host.
panels.title: Ambient

panels.description: The reading of the host's temperature sensors (when available).
panels.title: Temperatures

panels.description: The reading of the host's fans speed (when available).
panels.title: Fans Speed

panels.description:
The number of degrees Celsius (Â°C) remaining before the temperature reaches the closest warning temperature threshold of the host.

A value of 0 indicates a critical temperature.
panels.title: Heating Margin

panels.description: The average speed of all the host's fans.
panels.title: Avg Fan Speed

panels.description:
Data transmitted and received by the host.

Positive values correspond to transmitted data.
Negative values correspond to received data.
panels.title: Total Traffic (bytes/s)

panels.description: The network interfaces and their current link status (plugged or unplugged).
panels.title: Network Links

panels.description:
The highest network interface error ratio (total traffic vs errors).

This value should be at 0% or as close to 0% as possible.

targets.expr:
sum(hw_errors_total{site="$site", host_name="$host_name", hw_type="network"})
/ 
(sum(hw_network_packets_total{site="$site", host_name="$host_name", direction="receive"})
+ sum(hw_network_packets_total{site="$site", host_name="$host_name", direction="transmit"}) * 100)

panels.title: Max Error Ratio

panels.description:
The network interfaces bandwidth utilization.

The bandwidth utilization should stay under 90% at all times.
panels.title: Bandwidth Utilization

panels.description: The reading of the host's voltage sensors (when available).
panels.title: Voltages

panels.description: The percentage of battery charge (when available).
panels.title: Battery Charge

panels.description:
The disks remaining lifetime in percentage.

A value lower than 3% indicates that the disk should be replaced.
panels.title: Endurance Remaining

panels.description: Time since the monitoring of this host by Hardware Sentry was started.
panels.title: Collect Started

title: Hardware Host (MetricsHub)
